1.content: One day as you (Ian) was walking to Prof. Oaks lab to get your first pokemon you meet an old man giving out pokegear applications. You decided to get one because your mom got you some pokegear from johto. "Here kid, a free pokegear application!" the old man says. "what does it do?" you ask. "the best way to learn, is to do my friend." the old man says. "what exactly does tha-: you say but you're interupted because the old man uses teleport and is gone. You press the button application and it says possession application. *Possession application. use this application and call anyone to turn into them.* "Aww just another prank. Well I should just try it out for the kicks." you say.
1.title: the old man and the poke gear

11.content: Green you female rival, friend, and pretty much your crush. So why you could try to possess her even though this is a joke. You typed in Green's name and you blacked out for a second and then you were in Green's body." Oh my gosh! I'm in Green's body and my voice! This pokegear really works!" you said in Green's voice." I wonder if I can investigate her body." So you want to check out Green's body.
11.title: Green your female rival

111.content: So you took of Green's shirt and her skirt. You didn't have sex with yourself but you still walked with her bra and panty.
111.title: Yes

1113.content: you decide to leave her body, as you felt you were invading her privacy. after learning the app works you decide to...
1113.title: Leave her body

11132.content: you decide to try possessing a pokemon. you possess a...
11132.title: possess a pokemon

15.content: Here are some more choices of whom to possess.
15.title: other

15411.content: '' well, even if it's a prank i will just go along with it.'' Ian muttered.As he wrote mew's name, Ian suddenly blacked out without even a single word.When he opened his eyes he saw that he was floating off the ground as well as his entire body looking like a small pink cat.Feeling amazed he stared to fly around and use several abilities associated with mew. ''Im flying i can't believe it??!!!!'' he shouted.He then.........
15411.title: Mew

1542.content:
Since this is the Kanto Region, the final forms of the three starters are: Charizard, Venusaur and Blastoise.

Also; since Ian doesn't have his own Pokémon yet, whichever one he picks will belong to another trainer.

So; which Pokémon will Ian choose to possess?
1542.title: A final form starter

155.content: What about these options,You Possession lover...
155.title: Other options

info.brief_description: A boy named Ian possesses people from pokemon! Please add!
info.description:
Hello and this is a story of Pokemon Possessions! Please whoever made pokemon possession one and two, please dont get angry but i wanted to make my own possession story.

Meet the characters!:
Ian:if you've read the other possessions then this stands for Insert A Name.
Gary Oak: Ian's childhood rival. They've known each other since they were babies and is also in love with Green
Green: Ian's female childhood rival. She loves grass type pokemon.
Daisy Oak: Gary Oaks little sister.
Gym Leaders: Sabrina, Erika, Misty, Jasmine, and other gym leaders from kanto.
Elite Four:sorry i forgot the names but you should probably know them.

Feel free to add more characters!

I will also not be adding any addidtions to this story so this is all up to you!
Thats it but no sex scenes!
